subject: Cool voice, too bad no one hears it.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
From Ouija Box 4. Check the pronunciation of Kiera, that is exactly what it
is supposed to sound like and never coulds figure out how to spell that.

 F-S

F om Ouija Box 4. Check he p onuncia ion o Kie a, ha is exac ly wha i is supposed o sound like and ne e coulds igu e ou how o spell ha . 
 
 F-S
